title: Nkima
content:
Nkima

Ng'ura, nkima!

Kepejisho nkima.

Keyerisho nkima.

Keysheru nkima nkirewaj.

Keysheru nkima ong'an.

Ng'ura, nkima!

Kesupat oleng' nkima.

Naa keata ngupu.

License: [CC-BY]

Text: Deborah Namugosa, Beatrice Nabune, Alison Tukei, Rose Sabano

Illustration: Rob Owen

Translated By: Zainab Bishar

Language: saq
